login.title: Welcome to grAIde
login.subtitle: Save 60-80% of your grading time
login.permissions_intro: To help you grade efficiently, grAIde needs access to:

sheets.title: Google Sheets
sheets.description: Store your classes, students, tests, and grades in a spreadsheet you can edit anytime

drive.title: Google Drive
drive.description: Access your grAIde workspace folder (contains your data spreadsheet and test photos)

profile.title: Your Profile
profile.description: Display your name and email in the app

login.privacy_note: All your data stays in your Google account. grAIde runs on your laptop - no server uploads.
login.terms: By signing in, you agree to use grAIde for educational purposes.
login.storage_note: grAIde uses Google Sheets and Drive to store your data securely in your own Google account.

logout.confirm: Are you sure you want to log out?
